gfwr: Access data from Global Fishing Watch APIs

Source: R/gfwr-package.R
gfwr-package.Rd

This package connects to several Global Fishing Watch APIs to get vessel and events information in an R-friendly format.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/GlobalFishingWatch/gfwr

  • https://globalfishingwatch.github.io/gfwr/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/GlobalFishingWatch/gfwr/issues
